title: EXTRA-LOW VOLTAGE
fullText:
Testing shall be carried out on parts of electrical installations and equipment designed to operate at ELV. Such testing should confirm the following:
(a) Continuity of the earthing system for protective ELV circuits.
(b) Insulation resistance of conductors tested at 250 V d.c. and a reading of not less than 0.5 MÎ©.
(c) Polarity for protective ELV circuits.
(d) Correct circuit connections.
